Name: Darkness Ahead
About the game: Darkness Ahead is an adventure game about a man searching for his little brother. The game is set in a plateau between mountains that holds a dark secret about its past. As you try to find clues, you will face many obstacles such as threats, puzzles and supernatural events. You have to stay alive and collect everything you need to find your brother. Searching abandoned buildings to find useful tools helps your quest of finding out what happened. Gathering clues while staying alive is the primary goal of the game. In the meantime, you use different tools to help you on your adventure. Understanding what happened and acting on it is the key to solve the mystery. Features Mysterious story Collectibles Puzzle
